abstract: Parties in copyright claim case of song Happy Birthday reach settlement; song is formally expected to enter public domain; song's publisher is Warner Music.
lead_paragraph: If the settlement is approved, the popular song will enter the public domain and the publisher will not collect royalties.

headline.main: ‘Happy Birthday’ Copyright Case Reaches a Settlement
headline.print_headline: ‘Happy Birthday’ Copyright Case Reaches a Settlement

snippet: If the settlement is approved, the popular song will enter the public domain and the publisher will not collect royalties.
